Text: Noone wants the dubbed shit, except for cultureless people.

Can't get Dragon Tattoo or Kicked the Hornet to play back on any Media Player that I have, but the Played with Fire does. Normally don't have a problem with avi or dvd files. Anyone have any ideas?

I don't get why so many people are complaining about the first movie being dubbed. It's a good dub that sounds/looks natural. You can just as easily download the movie from another torrent and get the sequels on this one.

Could some-one please do a proper release of these EXCELLENT Stieg Larsson Millennium Trilogy movies ?

Thank you very much to all the people that have put them out so far, but there is no high quality proper release out yet, believe me, I've trawled through them all. What we need is:

- extended versions (movies approx 3 hours each rather than approx 2h30m)

- bluray 720p or, even better 1080p (not DVD rip!)

- original Swedish language, *with optional English subs* and *optional* English dubs for those who want it


The boxset has been out for months so I'm surprised no-one has released them yet from the US Blurays.

http://www.amazon.com/Dragon-Tattoo-Trilogy-Extended-Blu-ray/product-reviews/B005JTLTF2/ref=cm_cr_dp_all_helpful?ie=UTF8&showViewpoints=1&sortBy=bySubmissionDateDescending

http://www.amazon.com/Dragon-Tattoo-Trilogy-Noomi-Rapace/dp/B005JTLTI4/ref=sr_1_5ie=UTF8&qid=1325018613&sr=8-5

If anyone knows where to find these, please let me know! Thank you very much!
